main.description: A linguistic resource entry: a lexical item, frame element filler, morphological paradigm cell, or any atomic unit in a structured linguistic collection. Abstract enough to represent bead LexicalItems, FrameNet lexical units, PropBank rolesets, WordNet synset members, morphological paradigm cells, etc.

ontologyTypeRef.description: Reference to a pub.layers.ontology#typeDef classifying this entry.

knowledgeRefs.description: Knowledge graph groundings (WordNet synset, FrameNet lexical unit, Wikidata, etc.).

features.description: Open-ended features: pos, morphological features, frequency, register, etc.

components.description: For multi-word expressions: the component words.

mweKindUri.description: AT-URI of the MWE kind definition node. Community-expandable via knowledge graph.

mweKind.description: MWE kind slug (fallback when mweKindUri unavailable).

sourceRef.description: AT-URI of the source record this entry was derived from (e.g., an annotation, another entry).

metadata.description: Provenance: who created this entry, with what tool, under what persona.
